commitResults.messageBody: Implemented Greet, Echo, Exit
Implemented Add, List
Implemented Mark as Done
Implemented ToDos, Deadlines, Events
Test using the I/O redirection technique
Implemented Delete, used java Collections
Implemented Handle Errors

Implemented saving and loading of tasks added into Duke.

Saving and loading of the tasks is required to remember the tasks added even after the user exits Duke.

Used Java's I/O system to read from the file that saves data, named 'duke.txt'.

Each line of the text file represents a task's type, status, title, followed by deadline or duration, where each components is separated by '|'. Duration has a format of (from)-(to).

Used LocalDateTime for variables handling date and time.

Date and time of the deadline and event can be used more meaningfully.
Level 8
Fixed saving format of date and time of tasks

Changed structure of Duke in a more OOP style.

Divided main function in Duke into classes Ui, Storage, and Parser.

Created an abstract class called Command and created children of Command for each command input by the user.

This was done to each Unit Testing of the software.

Finished implementing and checking of Ui, Parser and Commands for Duke to be functioning in the correct way.

Implemented FormatChecker to Check formats for different String inputs that needs to be formatted to be processed.
Branch a more oop

Organised classes into suitable java packages.

Largest package is duke, commands are in duke.command, tasks(todo, deadline, event) are in duke.task.
Corrected date format, fixed minor bugs
Add Gradle support
Added JUnit Tests for FormatChecker and Command to test whether methods in FormatChecker and Command classes function correctly.
Packaged duke as an executable JAR file so that it can be distributed easily.

Implemented find command to find tasks that contains the string that the user wants to find.

Removed tabs from all messages.
Added JavaDoc for major classes; Duke, Ui, Parser, TaskList, Task, Storage, FormatChecker, DukeException, Command.
Added JavaDoc
Level 9
Updated FormatChecker to test formats based on different expected outputs
Update FormatChecker.java
Added checkstyle to detect coding style violation.
Fixed coding style violations excluding missing JavaDoc

Added GUI for Duke using JavaFX

Modified execute method of command classes to return String.

Added fxml files for styling

Need to add greeting and ending.
Branch level 10
Added explanations on features of Duke.
Updated README.md

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated the code to meet the coding standard
commitResults.messageBody: Updated the code to meet the coding standard (except Javadoc, which would be updated soon)

commitResults.messageTitle: Used Assertions to check correct format
commitResults.messageBody: Used Java Assertions to check whether formats for deadline command, event command and date is correct.
Used Assertions to check correct format

Added Javadoc for classes and methods without Javadoc.

Removed unnecessary throwing statement of DukeException in execute method of some commands.

Refactored class name of TodoCommand to be ToDoCommand so that it follows the coding standard.

Changed the names of add method in TaskList so that it is easier to identify which task is being added to the TaskList.

Modified find method in TaskList to show the index to match the index of the task in the whole TaskList, not in the list of matching tasks.
Added Javadoc, Matched coding standard

commitResults.messageTitle: Added to detect duplicates, Fixed minor javafx issues
commitResults.messageBody:
Added lines to detect duplicated tasks so that it would not be added multiple times.

Changed background colour of main window to match the dialog box.

Set maxHeight of dialog box to be max value so that it can show long content.

commitResults.messageTitle: Changed name of the software, Fixed minor bugs
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed the software to DOggi, changed responses shown to the user to meet the concept.

Fixed the bug that does not show the full content when the content is long.

Added greeting message when the software starts.

Added execution of the software when EndCommand is executed.

Added more condition for commands involving index so that index smaller than 1 (out of range) throws an exception.

commitResults.messageTitle: Updated user guide and product screenshot
commitResults.messageBody: Updated user guide and product screenshot for the github page.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed file not found for jar file bug and minor bugs
commitResults.messageBody:
Added file to be created if data file does not exists.

Renamed package GUI to gui so that it follows the coding standard.
